-1.title: Episode A
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Imagine a group of very young Top Gear presenters in a Sesame Street/Panto style with strong British accents and lots of rock and roll! The show is designed to show people lots of free and low-cost adventures and activities for children. It also encourages viewers to get involved in a local Brilliant Book Club meet-up at a local library, art and crafts store or bookshop. The show has an interactive website to encourage viewers to share their Brilliant artwork/photos and other stuff.
imdb.title: The Brilliant Book
plot: _The Brilliant Book_ (qv) follows the adventures found in a book as seen through the eyes of a boy and his friends.::Rhonda Merrick

Imagine a group of very young Top Gear presenters in a Sesame Street/Panto style with strong British accents and lots of rock and roll! The show is designed to show people lots of free and low-cost adventures and activities for children. It also encourages viewers to get involved in a local Brilliant Book Club meet-up at a local library, art and crafts store or bookshop. The show has an interactive website to encourage viewers to share their Brilliant artwork/photos and other stuff.::Rhonda Merrick
